dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Hm… You can place new assignments on the left— Ah, you called for me.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: …Is it… morning? C’est étrange. I do not remember clocking out.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามกลางวัน
dataList.dlg: Allow me… to nap for a moment. You can… have your lunch first…

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: My evenings are mostly occupied with outdoor assignments. Ah, I had my rest earlier today, so it’s fine.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: I have taken care of the task you told me. I currently have assignments from four people, so if you have another request to make… It will have to wait until I’m done with these.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: It has… been quite some time since I clocked out last. However, I cannot leave while the work I’ve been entrusted with isn’t done.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: You’re… curious about this drink, I see. No, it’s not my preference. It simply is the only method I have to relieve exhaustion quickly.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg:
You’ll… do some of my work for me?
I do not understand. These assignments are my responsibility. There is no need to share my burden.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: The workload wasn’t always this heavy. When others left their work to me, I simply proved capable of handling it.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg:
……
(He’s snoring softly)

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: Hm. You’re giving me a raise. Entendu. Pardon me then, as I have tasks to take care of…

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: I see you need me.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Engaging in external assignment.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: I presume you have a request.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: Entendu, will do.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: The assignment is steadily approaching completion.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Gasp.

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: One has been taken care of.

dataList.desc: ตาย
dataList.dlg: Ah… Allow me… to rest for a moment…

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: It appears I… will be able to leave work on time.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: That has confirmed that I… will have overtime.

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: Assignment complete. I’ll be returning to the office.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Assignment complete. …You mean that I can go home today. Entendu. Ouf…

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Things… have gotten complicated.
